ImageInsightExplorerPage.title: Image Insight Explorer
ImageInsightExplorerPage.description: Upload an image to identify objects, see translations, and discover related products and stores.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.uploadCardDescription: Select an image file (PNG, JPG, GIF, etc.) up to 5MB.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.fileSizeError: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.fileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.locationCardDescription: Allow access to your location to optimize future store searches (optional).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.locationAcquiredToast: Your location has been successfully obtained!
ImageInsightExplorerPage.locationAcquiredCard: Your location has been obtained: Lat {latitude}, Lng {longitude}.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.identifiedObjectsCardDescription: Objects found in the image with their translations.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.relatedProductsCardDescription: Products found related to the identified objects (based on original names).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.productPropertiesCardDescription: Key properties extracted for the identified products.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.analysisCompleteNoDetails: The image was processed, but no additional details could be extracted. You can try with a different image.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.footerText: © {year} Image Insight Explorer. Developed with Genkit AI.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.translationsProvidedFor: Translations provided for: Spanish, French, German, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal).
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noObjectsIdentifiedToastDescription: No objects identified in the image.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noRelatedProductsToastDescription: No related products found for the objects.
ImageInsightExplorerPage.noProductsToExtractPropertiesToastDescri: No products to extract properties from. Property extraction step skipped.

MonitoringPage.title: Price Monitoring
MonitoringPage.description: View the average value of products by country.
MonitoringPage.selectProductCardDescription: Choose a product to see its price data by country.
MonitoringPage.averagePriceCardDescription: Average value of the selected product in countries where it is available.
MonitoringPage.noAggregatedPriceData: No aggregated price data by country to display for the selected product. Check if products have availability registered and if associated stores have `countryCode`.
MonitoringPage.noProductsFoundToastDescription: There are no products in the database to monitor.
MonitoringPage.noPriceDataToastDescription: No price information found for this product.
MonitoringPage.insufficientDataToastDescription: Could not aggregate price data by country (check if stores have 'countryCode').
